minecraft-cursor.options.xhot.tooltip:
Horizontal offset of the cursor's hotspot/click point from the left.

Scales automatically with the scale option.
minecraft-cursor.options.yhot.tooltip:
Vertical offset of the cursor's hotspot/click point from the top.

Scales automatically with the scale option.
minecraft-cursor.options.hot.tooltip: Visible only in this menu to aid configuration of hotspot.
